metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1295 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A time-of-check to time-of-use issue exists in io_uring subsystem'sIORING_OP_CLOSE operation in the Linux kernel's versions 5.6 - 5.11(inclusive), which allows a local user to elevate their privileges to root.Introduced in b5dba59e0cf7e2cc4d3b3b1ac5fe81ddf21959eb, patched in9eac1904d3364254d622bf2c771c4f85cd435fc2, backported to stable in788d0824269bef539fe31a785b1517882eafed93.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
